Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class OfflineRemoteView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.RemoteView
it.polimi.ingsw.client.OfflineRemoteView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer<ServerMessage>
public class OfflineRemoteView
extends RemoteView
Class that inherits from RemoteView and implements the offline version of that class. This class receives ServerMessage from the Game and forwards them to the OfflineClient which handles them.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private OfflineClient client
    The client which handles the messages sent from this class.

    • OfflineRemoteView

      protected OfflineRemoteView​(User user, GameController gameController, OfflineClient client)
      Constructs an instance of this class from the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      user - the user owner of this remote view.
      gameController - the game controller which handles the messages sent from the client.
      client - the client associated to this remote view.
